treks.title: Annapurna Base Camp Trek
treks.short_description: Trek to the stunning amphitheatre of Annapurna Base Camp surrounded by towering peaks and magnificent mountain vistas.
treks.review_text: One of Nepal's most rewarding base camp treks with incredible Himalayan scenery.

hero_section.title: Annapurna Base Camp Trek
hero_section.subtitle: Best Himalayan views in the Annapurna region

sections.heading: Trek Overview of Annapurna Base Camp
articles: The Annapurna Base Camp Trek is a beautiful journey through rhododendron forests, terraced fields, and charming villages to reach the stunning amphitheatre of Annapurna Base Camp. This trek offers breathtaking 360-degree views of peaks including Annapurna I, Machapuchare, and Hiunchuli, making it one of Nepal's most rewarding trekking experiences.

itinerary_days.title: Drive from Kathmandu to Pokhara
itinerary_days.description: Scenic drive through valleys and forests to Pokhara, the lake city of Nepal.

itinerary_days.title: Drive to Naya Pul and trek to Birethanti
itinerary_days.description: Drive to Naya Pul and begin trekking through traditional villages and rice terraces.

itinerary_days.title: Trek to Ghandruk
itinerary_days.description: Trek uphill through beautiful forest and terraced landscape to reach the Gurung village of Ghandruk.

itinerary_days.title: Trek to Chomes
itinerary_days.description: Gradual ascent through rhododendron and oak forests with stunning mountain views.

itinerary_days.title: Trek to Deorali and Tadapani
itinerary_days.description: Trek through dense rhododendron forests with glimpses of Machapuchare (Fishtail) peak.

itinerary_days.title: Trek to Bhandar and Sinuwa
itinerary_days.description: Trek through pine forests and open hillsides with panoramic views of the Annapurna range.

itinerary_days.title: Trek to Samrung and Deurali
itinerary_days.description: Trek through rhododendron and bamboo forests with Machapuchare getting closer.

itinerary_days.title: Trek to Machapuchare Base Camp
itinerary_days.description: Trek through alpine meadows to Machapuchare Base Camp with stunning early views of the base camp.

itinerary_days.title: Trek to Annapurna Base Camp
itinerary_days.description: Final trek to the stunning amphitheatre of Annapurna Base Camp surrounded by magnificent peaks.

itinerary_days.title: Acclimatization day and sunrise hike
itinerary_days.description: Rest day at ABC with optional sunrise hike for better acclimatization and mountain photography.

itinerary_days.title: Trek back to Machapuchare Base Camp and Samrung
itinerary_days.description: Begin descent with final views of Annapurna and surrounding peaks.

itinerary_days.title: Trek to Pokhara and departure
itinerary_days.description: Trek down to Naya Pul and drive back to Pokhara or Kathmandu.

highlights.title: Annapurna Base Camp Amphitheatre
highlights.description: 360-degree panoramic views of Annapurna I, Annapurna South, Machapuchare, and Hiunchuli.

highlights.title: Machapuchare (Fishtail)
highlights.description: Iconic sacred peak with stunning reflection views throughout the trek.

highlights.title: Rhododendron Forests
highlights.description: Beautiful wildflower forests, especially vibrant during spring season.

highlights.title: Traditional Villages
highlights.description: Experience authentic Gurung culture and hospitality in remote villages.

cost.title: Cost Includes / Excludes
cost_inclusions: TIMS card and Annapurna Conservation Area permit
All meals (breakfast, lunch, dinner) during trek

cost_and_date_section.intro_text: Choose your preferred dates and group size. Prices vary seasonally.

date_highlights.highlight: Best visibility in March, April, October, November
Spring offers rhododendron flowers; Autumn gives clear skies

questions.question: Is Annapurna Base Camp Trek suitable for beginners?
questions.answer: Yes, it is suitable for people with good fitness levels. The trek is graded moderate and doesn't require technical climbing skills.

questions.question: What is the best time to trek?
questions.answer: Spring (March-May) and Autumn (September-November) offer the best weather, visibility, and conditions.

questions.question: How physically fit do I need to be?
questions.answer: You need good overall fitness with regular walking or hiking experience. The trek involves 5-7 hours of walking daily.

questions.question: What about altitude sickness?
questions.answer: The maximum altitude is 4,130m, which is moderate. Proper acclimatization, hydration, and gradual ascent help prevent altitude sickness.

questions.question: Do I need travel insurance?
questions.answer: Yes, comprehensive travel insurance covering trekking up to 4,500m and medical evacuation is recommended.

questions.question: What should I pack?
questions.answer: Pack warm clothing, rain gear, good trekking boots, sun protection, and a sleeping bag. Detailed packing list provided upon booking.

questions.question: What type of accommodation will we have?
questions.answer: Comfortable teahouses with basic amenities. Most have heating stoves, toilets, and hot water buckets.

questions.question: What are the meals like?
questions.answer: All meals are provided during the trek, including local Nepali cuisine and international options. Special dietary requirements can be accommodated with advance notice.

questions.question: Are there shower facilities?
questions.answer: Most teahouses have basic hot shower facilities. In remote areas, hot water buckets are provided.

gallery_images.title: Annapurna Base Camp
gallery_images.caption: Stunning amphitheatre of peaks at the base camp.

gallery_images.title: Machapuchare Peak
gallery_images.caption: Sacred fishtail peak with pristine snow.

gallery_images.title: Sunrise at Base Camp
gallery_images.caption: Golden hour views of the Annapurna range.

additional_info_sections.heading: Important Notes
articles: Carry warm layers and rain protection as weather can change rapidly in the mountains.
The trek involves daily walks of 5-7 hours at increasing altitude. Proper pacing and hydration are essential.
Teahouses operate on a first-come, first-served basis during peak seasons. Early booking is recommended.
Mobile network coverage is intermittent in higher regions.
